quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Winners are losers who got up and gave it one more try.
author: Dennis DeYoung

quote: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: The question isn’t who’s going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Begin with the end in mind.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: You should set goals beyond your reach so you always have something to live for.
author: Ted Turner
